item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Why I love Rust for tokenising and parsing (75 points | 14 comments)
2. Ham Radio 101: What is WSPR? (93 points | 32 comments)
3. After decades, FDA moves to pull ineffective decongestant off shelves (138 points | 76 comments)
4. Launch HN: Codebuff (YC F24) – CLI tool that writes code for you (224 points | 179 comments)
5. Guild Builds (24 points | discuss)
6. Functional ultrasound through the skull (160 points | 45 comments)
7. Using Ghidra and Python to reverse engineer Ecco the Dolphin (353 points | 90 comments)
8. Kagi Translate (18 points | 2 comments)
9. Sustainable Web Interest Group Is Formed (131 points | 38 comments)
10. AI for real-time fusion plasma behavior prediction and manipulation (223 points | 107 comments)
11. FDA Proposes Ending Use of Oral Phenylephrine as OTC Nasal Decongestant (15 points | 3 comments)
12. Mushroom Color Atlas (185 points | 22 comments)
13. QNX is now free for anything non-commercial, plus there's an RPi image (487 points | 213 comments)
14. Show HN: Draw.Audio – A musical sketchpad using the Web Audio API (71 points | 28 comments)
15. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (179 points | 60 comments)
16. Wild Ball (35 points | 30 comments)
17. Show HN: BemiDB – Postgres read replica optimized for analytics (161 points | 83 comments)
18. Edge Scripting: Build and run applications at the edge (91 points | 43 comments)
19. Turing kicked us out of Heaven (2023) (24 points | 15 comments)
20. Ralph Abraham was always looking for the big picture (29 points | 3 comments)
21. Ambulance hits cyclist, rushes him to hospital, then sticks him with $1,800 bill (224 points | 188 comments)
22. The Brothers Grimm: A Biography (44 points | 11 comments)
23. Hyperlight: Virtual machine-based security for functions at scale (89 points | 18 comments)
24. Imaging shapes of atomic nuclei in high-energy nuclear collisions (40 points | 3 comments)
25. Show HN: Directional antenna alignment using phone motion sensors (32 points | 11 comments)
26. Ultraprecise method of aligning 3D semiconductor chips invented (132 points | 17 comments)
27. Excerpts from a conversation about personal information management (152 points | 73 comments)
28. The egg or the chicken? An ancient unicellular says egg (52 points | 73 comments)
29. Five minutes of exercise a day could lower blood pressure (115 points | 69 comments)
30. Toronto crypto company CEO kidnapped, held for $1M ransom before being released (155 points | 113 comments)
